org.cooperari

Interface CTest

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Runnable

    public interface CTest
extends Runnable
    Cooperative test.
    Since:
    0.2

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default AnnotatedElement getConfiguration()
      Get configuration.
      String getName()
      Get test name.
      String getSuiteName()
      Get name of the test suite to which this test belongs.
      default boolean ignoreException(Throwable e)
      Callback method invoked in case test trial completes with an exception.
      default void onNormalCompletion()
      Callback method invoked in case test trial completed normally (without exceptions, e.g., related to test assertions).
      void run()
      Execution method.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Get test name.
        Returns:
        A string identifying the test.

      • getSuiteName

        String getSuiteName()
        Get name of the test suite to which this test belongs.
        Returns:
        A string identifying the suite.

      • getConfiguration

        default AnnotatedElement getConfiguration()
        Get configuration.
        Returns:
        An annotation provider for the test configuration. The default implementation returns the class handle for CBaseConfiguration.

      • run

        void run()
        Execution method.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable

      • onNormalCompletion

        default void onNormalCompletion()
                         throws Throwable
        Callback method invoked in case test trial completed normally (without exceptions, e.g., related to test assertions). The default implementation does nothing.
        Throws:
        Throwable - In case an error needs to be reported by the handler.

      • ignoreException

        default boolean ignoreException(Throwable e)
        Callback method invoked in case test trial completes with an exception. The default implementation returns false.
        Parameters:
        e - Exception.
        Returns:
        true if exception is expected and/or should be ignored
